text: The women's sprint K-1 (kayak single) 500 metres competition at the 2018 Asian Games was held on 30 August 2018. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Thursday, 30 August 2018 || 08:50 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Results== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athlete !width=80|Time |- | |align=left| |1:59.468 |- | |align=left| |2:02.280 |- | |align=left| |2:02.532 |- |4 |align=left| |2:03.206 |- |5 |align=left| |2:04.202 |- |6 |align=left| |2:04.836 |- |7 |align=left| |2:13.248 |- |8 |align=left| |2:20.606 |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website Women's K-1 500 metres
title: Canoeing at the 2018 Asian Games – Women's K-1 500 metres
